sprites_description.snake_head: Snake head sprite facing right direction, bright green rectangular shape with darker green outline, pixel art style with clean geometric edges, top-down view showing the leading segment of the snake, used as the primary controllable element in a classic snake game
sprites_description.snake_body: Snake body segment sprite, medium green rectangular shape with darker green border, pixel art style with consistent visual design, top-down view showing a uniform body segment, used for all intermediate segments following the head in the snake chain
sprites_description.snake_tail: Snake tail segment sprite, slightly darker green rectangular shape with outline, pixel art style matching the body segments, top-down view showing the final segment of the snake, used as the trailing element of the snake body

sprites_description.food_apple: Red apple food item sprite, circular red shape with darker red shading and small green stem, pixel art style with bright contrasting colors, top-down view showing a classic apple design, spawns randomly on the game grid for the snake to consume and grow

sprites_description.grid_background: Game board background tile with grid lines, dark background with lighter gray grid lines forming a square pattern, pixel art style with clean geometric lines, top-down view showing a repeatable tile pattern, used to create the playing field background in the snake game

sprites_description.ui_score_panel: Score display background panel, dark rectangular UI element with subtle border, pixel art style with clean edges, front-facing view showing a container for score text, used to display current game score and high score information
sprites_description.ui_button_play: Start/play button in normal state, bright green rectangular button with rounded corners and 'PLAY' text, pixel art style with clean button design, front-facing view showing an interactive game start element, used to begin gameplay from the main menu
sprites_description.ui_button_play_hover: Start/play button in hover state, slightly brighter green rectangular button with enhanced visual feedback, pixel art style with subtle glow effect, front-facing view showing button interaction state, used to provide visual feedback when hovering over the play button
sprites_description.ui_button_restart: Restart button for game over screen, blue rectangular button with 'RESTART' text, pixel art style with contrasting colors, front-facing view showing a game reset control, used to restart the game after game over condition
sprites_description.ui_button_pause: Pause button icon, small square button with pause symbol (two vertical bars), pixel art style with simple geometric design, front-facing view showing a game control element, used to pause and unpause gameplay during active game sessions

sprites_description.game_over_overlay: Semi-transparent overlay background for game over screen, dark rectangular panel with subtle transparency and border, pixel art style with clean geometric edges, front-facing view showing a modal dialog background, used to display game over information and restart options over the game field
